Package net.grinder.tools.tcpproxy

TCPProxy implementation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CommentSource Interface for passing comments, inserted by the user during a capture with the TCPProxy, to the TCPProxyFilters.
TCPProxyEngine Interface for TCPProxy engines.
TCPProxyFilter Interface that TCP Proxy filters must implement.
TCPProxySocketFactory Socket factory interface.
TCPProxySSLSocketFactory Socket factory interface for SSL sockets.
UpdatableCommentSource Interface for collecting the user inserted comments during a capture with the TCPProxy.
 

Class Summary
AbstractFilterDecorator Abstract decorator for TCPProxyFilters.
AbstractTCPProxyEngine Base class for TCPProxyEngine implementations.
CommentSourceImplementation Thread-safe implementation of the CommentSource and UpdatableCommentSource interfaces.
CompositeFilter Composite TCPProxyFilter.
ConnectionDetails Class that represents a TCP connection.
EchoFilter Filter that echos to the output stream of a logger.
EndPoint Class that represents the endpoint of a TCP connection.
HTTPMethodAbsoluteURIFilterDecorator TCPProxyFilter decorator that recognises HTTP request messages and converts any relative URLs in the method line returned from the delegate filter to an absolute URI before returning the transformed result.
HTTPMethodRelativeURIFilterDecorator TCPProxyFilter decorator that recognises HTTP request messages and converts any absolute URLs in the method line to relative URLs before passing to the filter.
HTTPProxyTCPProxyEngine HTTP/HTTPS proxy implementation.
HTTPResponse Simple HTTP response formatting.
NullFilter Filter that does nothing.
PortForwarderTCPProxyEngine Simple implementation of TCPProxyEngine that connects to a single remote server.
TCPProxyConsole Console for the TCPProxy.
TCPProxySocketFactoryImplementation TCPProxySocketFactory for plain connections.
TCPProxySSLSocketFactoryImplementation TCPProxySocketFactory for SSL connections.
 

Exception Summary
TCPProxyFilter.FilterException Exception type for filter problems.
VerboseConnectException VerboseConnectException: a ConnectException that has a more useful message.
 

Package net.grinder.tools.tcpproxy Description

TCPProxy implementation.
